roleset.name: able to be denied
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6, relation to deny.01.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Nagoya 's Mayor Shintaro Ishihara uttered total nonsense : " when the ' Nanjing Incident ' happened in 1937 , normal acts of war are not deniable , which is a pity , but the so - called ' Nanjing Incident ' could not have happened . "
example.arg: when the ' Nanjing Incident ' happened in 1937
